summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that validate the behavior of AWS Greengrass group management operations using a mocked AWS environment. The tests cover creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting groups and their versions, as well as associating and disassociating IAM roles, and handling various error conditions.
business_intent: Ensure that Greengrass group lifecycle APIs function correctly and robustly, providing confidence that applications relying on group management will behave as expected in production.
